cwe_description: The product reads data past the end, or before the beginning, of an intended buffer. This can lead to the exposure of sensitive information, a crash, or other undefined behavior.
explanation: The code accesses s->edid_blob using s->reg as an index and then increments s->reg without any bounds checking. If s->reg is not properly validated and exceeds the allocated size of s->edid_blob, it will result in an out-of-bounds read, potentially leading to information disclosure, denial of service, or other undefined behavior.
